Html:
Greetings,

I am not sure if my issue is a bug or I am doing something wrong. I started using Rawr with v2.3.8 and recently upgraded to 2.3.11 it worked fine with the previous version but now once I load my character from the armory the item comparison list only shows items that I have equipped and nothing else. Am I doing something wrong or is this a bug. I have tried re-downloading  the app and it does the same thing. Thank you in advance.

It has the items checked that would be appropriate for the character I am loading when I look at the selection for "Refine Types of Items Listed". Feral Druid is the class I am loading. Since this is a fresh download I would not think there is a default filter in place and I have not created any filters.
What you're describing is the result of having filters set to hide a wide selection of items. See both Refine Types of Items Listed, and the actual filters (in the top right).

Thank you.

I see what happened now. Heroic items where showing up in the Comparisons pane so I apparently removed the check mark from the "Other" option in the filters pull-down and once that was done EVERYTHING disappeared. Consequently adding that check mark back in restored the list of equipment options.

That issue is resolved but I am still faced with a related issue. How do I remove those Heroic ICC/ToC items from the comparisons list? I have the check marks removed from Heroic in those respective dungeons but the Heroic items are still showing up in the list. Should I create a custom filter to accomplish this instead of filtering them from the Comparisons pane?
